name: ElecHead
description:
ElecHead is an indie, action, adventure and puzzle game developed by NamaTakahashi, Tsuyomi and Gorillarigo. It came out on 23-06-2019. NamaTakahashi published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play ElecHead on PC and Nintendo Switch. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop, itch.io, Steam and GOG.
